question: You are offered two roles in the school play.Which one will you choose?

answers.a: the lead role, which is glamorous and gets you a lot of attention
answers.b: another part that’s less glamorous but lets you use more of your acting skills

question: You are offered two jobs. Which one will you choose?

answers.a: the one that pays very good money
answers.b: the one you’d really love doing, even though the pay isn’t very good

question: You are choosing between two classes. Which one will you sign up for?

answers.b: the more interesting, more challenging one

question: You must read at least one book this semester. Which will you choose?

answers.a: one book from the list the teacher has given you
answers.b: five books of your own choosing that are just as long

question: Two people have invited you out. Which will you choose?

answers.a: the person who is most fashionable to be seen with
answers.b: the much more interesting but less popular person

question: Which do you feel you learn more from?

answers.a: studying for a class so you can get an A
answers.b: studying for a class because you’re interested in it

question: In deciding between two sports, which will you choose?

answers.a: the one that gives trophies to the best players at the end of the season
answers.b: the one that’s the most fun

answers.a: cleaning your room so you will get your allowance
answers.b: cleaning your room because you want to

question: In general, which is more important to your decision-making?
In general, which are you more interested in?
